attributes.action: ensure Medical professionals gain more understanding and show more respect to sufferers of the rare condition Transverse Myelitis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Transverse Myelitis is a rare illness.
Most doctors don't seem to understand it so they try and fob off patients with any old drugs. More care should be given to disabled. (this country sickens me, it gives so much to the drug addicts and alcoholics which is self inflicted were as TM isn't) TM just strikes with no warning to anybody regardless of how healthy they are and is debilitating. Please train the so called medical professionals to help not hinder.
